Segment.name: Segment
Segment.description: Segment is a customer data platform (CDP) that helps you collect, clean, and control your customer data.

Antsomi CDP 365.description: Antsomi CDP 365 is a AI-enabled customer data platform from Southeast Asia.

Exponea.description: Exponea is a cloud-based marketing analysis platform suitable for large and midsize organisations in a variety of industries.

Lytics.name: Lytics
Lytics.description: Lytics is a customer data platform built for marketing teams.

mParticle.name: mParticle
mParticle.description: mParticle is a mobile-focused event tracking and data ingestion tool.

Netcore Cloud.name: Netcore Cloud
Netcore Cloud.description: Netcore Cloud is a globally recognised marketing technology SaaS company.

Optimove.name: Optimove
Optimove.description: Optimove is a relationship marketing hub powered by a combination of advanced customer modeling, predictive micro-segmentation and campaign automation technologies.

PriceSpider.name: PriceSpider
PriceSpider.description: PriceSpider is an advanced retail data technology company that provides insights about consumer purchasing behavior.

Rudderstack.description: Rudderstack is a customer data platform (CDP) that helps you collect, clean, and control your customer data.

Simon.description: Simon is a customer data platform (CDP) that helps you collect, clean, and control your customer data.

Sub2Tech.description: Sub2Tech is combining real time customer data with industry-leading technology.

Tail.name: Tail

Totango.name: Totango
